text: @GOPLeader So...over 96% of the country has never been tested and could be asymptomatic carriers?  That's "strong action" there, Kev.  And those vaccines...we may get one that works by next year, but, there was optimism once that there would be a vaccine for HIV. https://t.co/5fkF0YPNca
